name: Spotting Scam Red Flags
idea: A video showing how to spot common scam warning signs in messages or calls.

name: Urgent Scam Calls
idea: A video explaining what to do when someone urgently calls you about ‘fraud on your account.’

name: How to Tell if a Website is Safe
idea: A video teaching why websites must start with ‘https’ to be considered safe.

name: Don't Click That Link
idea: A video showing why you should never click suspicious links from emails or texts.

name: Password Safety Tips
idea: A video where Laura gets a suspicious call — should she give her password?

name: Investment Scam Signs
idea: A video where Tane is offered a ‘get rich quick’ investment — should he say yes?

name: How to Spot a Fake Bank Text
idea: A video where your friend gets a scam text from a bank they don’t even use.
